scripts.install: npm --prefix types install && npm --prefix server install --legacy-peer-deps --include=dev && npm --prefix client install --legacy-peer-deps --include=dev
scripts.build: npm --prefix types run build && concurrently "npm --prefix client run build" "npm --prefix server run build"
scripts.lint:all: concurrently "npm run lint:client" "npm run lint:server" "npm run lint:types"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently "npm --prefix client run lint:fix" "npm --prefix server run lint:fix" "npm --prefix types run lint:fix"
scripts.typecheck:all: concurrently "npm run typecheck:client" "npm run typecheck:server" "npm run typecheck:types"
scripts.test:all: concurrently "npm --prefix server run test" "npm --prefix client run test:e2e"
